original: Jacobsson, Elon Albert, ekonomichef, Göteborg, f. 18/7/92 i Örgryte, Gbgs o. Boh. i., av Sigfrid J. o. Emy Lefflier. G. 21-31 m. Sonja Hallberg. Son: Claes. — Stud:ex. 11, ex. v. Gbgs hand :inst. 12. Anst. v. SKF sed. 13, därav v. bol. anläggn. i USA o. Kanada 16-18 samt s. ekon:chef i Gbg sed. 22. Led. av ’Styr. f. Lidköp. Mek. Verkst. A-B, rev. i Ångfartygs A-B Tirfing, Gamlestadens Fabr. A-B, A-B Original-Odhner samt Elektro-Kem. A-B i Bohus. RVO, GM.
translated: Jacobsson, Elon Albert, Chief Financial Officer, Gothenburg, b. 18/7/92 in Örgryte, Gothenburg and Bohuslän province, son of Sigfrid J. and Emy Lefflier. Married from 1921 to 1931 to Sonja Hallberg. Son: Claes. Graduated from high school in 1911, graduated from Gothenburg Handelsinstitut in 1912. Employed at SKF since 1913, including assignments at company facilities in the United States and Canada from 1916 to 1918. Became CFO in Gothenburg in 1922. Board member of Lidköpings Mekaniska Verkstads AB, Ångfartygs AB Tirfing, Gamlestadens Fabriks AB, AB Original-Odhner, and Elektro-Kemiska AB in Bohus. Recipient of Royal Order of Vasa, Medal of Merit.
